title: Fixed an issue where a misconfigured plugin would cause the menubar to fail to load.
Fixed an error where users were unable to update activity duration on activities in Execute's operational scheduling module.
Improvements to calculated field performance for formulas that involved a divide by zero.
Browse reports (and many other report tabs) now support frozen titles, and columns using the new pushpin icon.
Upgraded 3rd party library (underscore.js) to eliminate a potential security vulnerability.
